text: ve prasann[1] hue, jo peechhe kar diye gaye, apane baithe rahane ke kaaran allaah ke rasool ke peechhe aur unhen bura laga ki jihaad karen apane dhanon tatha praanon se allaah kee raah mein aur unhonne kaha ki garmee mein na nikalo. aap kah den ki narak kee agni garmee mein isase bheeshan hai, yadi ve samajhate (to aisee baat na karate)
